title: What’s New in Bank Notes: November 2025
description:
Courtesy of Top World Banknotes/eBay.

Papua New Guinea

Announced in April 2025 and now released to the public, the Bank of Papua New Guinea’s new commemorative 50 kina honors the country’s 50th anniversary. The note appears like earlier 50-kina commemorative and circulating issues, with additions ...
